git_commands.description: Clone an existing repository from a remote server.
Stage changes to a file for the next commit.
Commit staged changes with a descriptive message.
Show the status of changes in the working directory.
Push local changes to the remote repository on the specified branch.
Fetch and merge changes from the remote repository to the local branch.
List all branches in the repository.
Merge changes from the specified branch into the current branch.
Show changes between the working directory and the index.
Show the remote repositories associated with the local repository.
